mapper.insert: insert into tbl_visit(id, owner, subject, contactsId, stage, priority, endDate, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, startTime, repeatType, noticeType) values (#{id},#{owner},#{subject},#{contactsId},#{stage},#{priority},#{endDate},#{createBy},#{createTime},#{editBy},#{editTime},#{description},#{startTime},#{repeatType},#{noticeType})
